languages.text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.
languages.original_text: При провале проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} персонажу, противник получает {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}. В случае успеха урон удваивается.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy fails a Willpower resistance test against the character, they suffers <u>character's Willpower bonus</u> direct damage. On succeed the damage is doubled.
Whenever an enemy fails a Willpower resistance test against the character, they suffer <u>character's WP bonus</u> direct damage. On success the damage is doubled.

Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.

Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} direct damage. On success the damage is doubled.

Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} contra el personaje, sufre {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}. Si la prueba tiene éxito, el daño se duplica.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} contra el personaje, sufre {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}. Si la prueba tiene éxito, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} se duplica.

Cuando un enemigo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} contra el personaje, sufre daño directo igual a la {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f}. Si la prueba tiene éxito, el daño se duplica.

languages.text: 敵がこのキャラクターに対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した時、{uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f}分の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。成功すると{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が倍になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is doubled.

traits.locale_text: 敵がこのキャラクターに対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した時、<u>キャラクターのWP{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の直接ダメージを受ける。成功するとダメージが倍になる。
敵がこのキャラクターに対する{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した時、{uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f}分の直接ダメージを受ける。成功するとダメージが倍になる。

languages.text: 每当敌人对抗此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}失败时，都会额外受到{uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f}点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。如果检定成功，受到的直击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}翻倍。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is doubled.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人对抗此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}失败时，都会额外受到直击伤害，等同于<u>此角色的意志{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。如果检定成功，受到的直击伤害翻倍。
每当敌人对抗此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}失败时，都会额外受到直击伤害，等同于{uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f}。如果检定成功，受到的直击伤害翻倍。

languages.text: Wenn ein Feind bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} gegen den Charakter scheitert, erleidet er {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}. Im Erfolgsfall wird der Schaden verdoppelt.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Feind bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gegen den Charakter scheitert, erleidet er {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}. Bei Erfolg wird der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verdoppelt.

Immer wenn ein Gegner bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gegen den Charakter scheitert, erleidet er {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} direkten Schaden. Bei Erfolg wird der Schaden verdoppelt.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} contre le personnage, il subit {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}. S'il le réussit, les dégâts sont doublés.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} contre le personnage, il subit <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de VOL du personnage</u> points de dégâts directs. S'il le réussit, les dégâts sont doublés.

Chaque fois qu'un ennemi échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} contre le personnage, il subit {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} points de dégâts directs. S'il le réussit, les dégâts sont doublés.

languages.text: При провале проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} персонажу, противник получает {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}. В случае успеха урон удваивается.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} against the character, they suffer {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. On success the damage is doubled.

traits.locale_text: При провале проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} персонажу, противник получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ</u> прямого урона. В случае успеха урон удваивается.

При провале проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} персонажу, противник получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ</u> прямого урона. В случае успеха урон удваивается.

При провале проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} персонажу, противник получает {uip|Damage|ffe7cf0f14ff411a981b63bdc228842f} прямого урона. В случае успеха урон удваивается.
